description:
Piano With Willie offers lessons to all skill levels of piano players. Willie uses the Foundational / Fundational approach when creating his lessons. Build upon your technique and polish up your skills with our piano lessons. In this lesson you’ll learn the New Orleans, Gene Harris and Fat’s Domino grooves in this lesson. I’ll also teach you the Boogie in octaves plus a bunch of licks, turnarounds and endings!

Learn about the New Orlean's style. You will be able to apply Boogie in octaves with turnarounds and endings. We've also included extra grooves and licks for you to put it all together.
title: Piano With Willie: Blues n' Boogie Vol. 3
